name: Last Night in Paris from Slightly Oliver
description: If you prefer your cocktails more bitter than sweet, this punch from Slightly Oliver is for you. It's spiked with rum and absinthe.
recipeIngredient: 2 bunches fresh mint, leaves removed from stems
10 ounces freshly squeezed pink grapefruit juice
1 ounce whiskey barrel-aged bitters (such as Fee Bros.)
Garnish: grapefruit, lemon, lime slices and more fresh mint

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle mint lightly in a punch bowl. Add both rums, absinthe, grapefruit juice, lime juice, bitters, and simple syrup. Stir and garnish with sliced grapefruit, lemon, and lime, and additional fresh mint.
